title: Stunning Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 deals drop to lowest prices ever at Amazon
author: tabitha-baker
summary: Premium tablets have never been this cheap
article: Samsung Galaxy tablet deals have been slowly chipping away at the prices of the latest release. However, Amazon's latest Presidents' Day sales have just slashed the prices of the Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 and S7 Plus down to new record lows.

These are some stunning discounts, with the Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 now starting at just $519.99 this weekend. That's all the way down from an MSRP of $649.99, beating even the Black Friday price by nearly $10. However, things only get better as you move up the storage levels. You'll find a 256GB tablet available for $569.99 (was $729.99) and 512GB up for $649.99 (was $829.99). Be sure to tick the Amazon coupon box on the page for the full savings.

However, Amazon's Presidents' Day sales are also offering Samsung Galaxy tablet deals on the S7 Plus model. The turbo charged tablet is available for as little as $719.99 right now, with a $130 discount on the 128GB version. Up at the top of the scale though, you can save $200 on the 512GB configuration, now available for $829.99.
Be sure to check out all the Presidents' Day sales available this weekend for even more discounts.
Not in the US? Scroll down for more Samsung Galaxy tablet deals in your region.

Samsung's competitor is also joining the party this weekend, and you'll find plenty of cheap iPad deals up for grabs. We're also rounding up a massive range of Android tablet deals if you're looking for something a little cheaper. However, if you're looking to spend as little as possible we'd recommend taking a look at Samsung Galaxy Tab A prices and Amazon Fire tablet deals.
